title: Save the refugees
content: for the raiders. (You can also steal the Druid artifact, so the Tieflings and Druids will fight each other. See Quest Steal the Sacred Idol) After you killed all the goblin leaders, you can leave the area through Underdark, or fast travel. You can find Absolute's Warboard (Uncommon Shield), Faithbreaker (Rare Martial hammer), Xyanyde (Rare melee weapon) on these goblin leaders. After you killed all the Goblin leaders, return to Druid and claim your reward. Ruth will give you a Rune of the Wolf.
